diwayine dushkara pradeshawala sitina sahaja kusalatha athi kridaka kridikawan jathika thalayata handunwadima sandaha jathika tharuna sewa sabhawa, yauwana katayuthu amathyanshaya saha shashri lanka yauwana samaja sammelanaya wishwa tharuna wasara nimiththen nawa krida wyapruthiyak kriyathmaka karayi.mema wyapruthiyata kabadi (pirimi), netbol (kantha) saha wolibol (kantha/ pirimi) yana krida isaw athulath we.me sandaha idiripath wiya hakke wayasa 15 – 22 athara awiwahaka, pasal noyana tharuna tharuniyanta pamani.prathamayenma pradeshiya lekam kottasa mattamin tharaga pawathwa daskam dakwannan disthrik tharagawalata idiripath kara anathuruwa jathika mattame tharagawaliyedi wishesha daskam dakwana kridaka kridikawan jathika mattame kabadi, wolibol ha netbol krida sanchithaya arambae.mama kridaka kridikawanta deshiya menma wideshiya puhunukaruwan yatathe wasara thunaka newasika puhunuwak heyiyanthuduwa krida pasaledi labadimata niyamithaya.ema kalaya thula krida, andum, aahara, newasika pahasukam ha waidyadhara jathika tharuna sewa sabhawa magin laba denu atha.mema sanchitha atharin jathika mattame krida kandayam sakas kerena athara wisheshitha daskam dakwana kridaka kridikawan krida upadeshakawarun ha puhunukaruwan lesa da yodaganimata da niyamithaya.meya yauwana katayuthu niyojya amathi mahindananda aluthgamage mahathage sankalpayaki.wadi wisthara sandaha diwayine sama pradeshiya lekam karyalayakatama anuyukthawa athi tharuna sewa niladharingen labagatha hakiya..

ranawiruwan pelimata manawa himikam komasarisge warthawa dewathwayen piliganna rajaya ehi athi balaya bedaharime kondesiwalata yatathwa “janarajaya” yanna iwath kara lankawa dekada kara swayan rajyayan bihikirime kriyawaliyaka da ada nirathawa athi bawata da wyawastha sampadana meheyum kamituwenma thorathuru labi atha. 2014 mayi masaye di eksath jathinge sanwidhanaya wisin manawa himikam karyalayata lanka hamudawa darunu yuda aparadha kale da yanna pilibandawa warthawak sakasa 2015 marthu wana wita manawa himikam komisamata idiripath karana lesa nawanidan pille mahathmiyata niyama kerina.
ikuth rajaya kaldamu palath sabha mathiwaranaya kadinamin pawathwimata katayuthu karana bawa amathya es bi disanayaka pawasanawa.
